description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 3 iterations of function f(x) = 5x + 4.
comments: n, 5*n+4, 25*n+24 and 125*n+124 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..150000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(5*n+4) and IsPrime(25*n+24) and IsPrime(125*n+124)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
